messages.title: Mike Findley: "The Truth About Marske Post Office"
messages.content: "Marske Post Office is closing temporarily solely because the current owner hasn’t yet found a buyer for his business. It is nothing to do with the Labour Government," says Mike.

housing.content: Marske Post Office is closing temporarily solely because the current owner hasn’t yet found a buyer for his business.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will do my best, with Mike Findley and other local councillors, to find a new Sub Postmaster for Marske.

quotes.text: "Marske residents are appalled at Lib Dem leaflet."

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet addresses controversy over the temporary closure of Marske Post Office and refutes claims made by a Lib Dem leaflet.
